org.easyrules.core

Class CompositeRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.easyrules.core.BasicRule
      • org.easyrules.core.CompositeRule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Rule>, Rule

    public class CompositeRule
extends BasicRule
    Class representing a composite rule composed of a set of rules. A composite rule is triggered if ALL conditions of its composing rules are satisfied. When a composite rule is applied, actions of ALL composing rules are performed.
    Author:
    Mahmoud Ben Hassine (mahmoud@benhassine.fr)
